/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings that dot the landscape. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are rich and natural, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
